blog.title: Is mirror.xyz a thing ?
blog.description: I discover Mirror.xyz - a decentralized publishing platform combining Medium-like writing with Ethereum monetization. ENS domains and crypto wallets enable seamless creator support.

prevBlog.title: Are decentral websites a thing for me ?
prevBlog.description: I explore decentralized web hosting using ENS domains and IPFS storage. Discover how blockchain enables censorship-resistant websites without traditional hosting companies.

nextBlog.title: Can I have interactive python pages ?
nextBlog.description: I explore the future of interactive content with Python running directly in browsers. Tools like Pyodide and JupyterLite enable portable, installation-free data science.
